review:
I had gap in front teeth and side teeth because of that I could not smile and look confident. 
 I consulted Dr Naveen Gupta who is a cosmetic dentist in Rohini .He suggested ceramic veneers on my front six teeth . He explained me the procedure very comprehensively and accurately . Doctor also did  Mockup smile desisning drill on my teeth and showed me the outcome so that i can see what would be my smile after the actual procedure which gave me a good idea instantly and immediatey i said yes to the procedure . I was amazed by the result after the veneer bonding and smile makeover ,now I can smile confidently . I would like to thank Dr Naveen Gupta for the extraordinary work . I would highly recommend Dr Naveen Gupta for the dental cosmetic and smile designing procedures . You can blindly trust the doctor and his team .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hello everyone, 
I would definitely like to share with you all my experience. I had visited this clinic recently and met Dr.Naveen Bansal for my capping trestment ,where I got to learn that my root canal wasn't treated well earlier . It was only partially done in 1 canal out of 3. So I undertook a re-root canal treatment with doc which was quite time taking and strenuous. It seemed all went well . Now the measurement has been taken for capping and I expect just one more visit is required for capping process.  Earlier I didn't know that capping is so important.  I learned its importance by dr Naveen that if it is not used ,our tooth might break or get a crack later sometime in future so its safer to get it capped for long run.
I would like to thank and recommend Smile and care dental clinic to everyone .
Regards,
Paridhi Agrawal
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words !! We are happy to solve your issue at its best !!

review: Three points: 1. Not value-for-money. 2. Doctor wasn't wearing the mask properly and was breathing on my face. 3. Got no receipt for the amount paid. Otherwise would love to visit again for doctor friendliness. Paid 1200+400 for one dental cavity filling.
reply_text:
At SmileNCareDentalClinics Dr always informed the Patient about charges before starting any procedure you have been informed about the charges about filling start from 1000-1200-1500 depending on material used . Whatever you have been opted procedure was done after your consent 
It‚Äôs always after patient agrees than only dr start n do the procedure 
400 Is dr consultation fees and clinic registration n other facilities charges . 
You did not ask any reciept it is always given if pt demand bill or reciept for reimbursement.
It is lack of communication from your side .
You should not judge the situation in haste
And always look from other perspective .

review: after they did treatment of 30000rs..They sir you have 10year warranty...suddenly after months bridge as been out in my mouth...They charge again for this...I never ever recommended this clinic ever to anyone....
reply_text:
You have visited the clinic or to a Dr after year than You expect from a Dr that he should see you n attended you without any fees than we feel sorry for you ! Irrespective of any issue it is dr right yo charge his fees !! You should not get offended gor this and there is no reason to comment on that !!
Other thing kindly note It is not dental Implant It is the bridge that came out and bridge is not damaged or broken . This bridge is just  Debonded and has to b fixed or recemented again . You have used this bridge for a year without any issue !! Warranty as you mentioned of bridge is for broken or damaged bridge not for cementation !! you are charged for visit/consultation fees !! you paid only visit charges that is 400 and 100 only for procedure charges .
